scripts.docker:build: docker build -t graphator-web:latest . && docker build -f Dockerfile.worker -t graphator-worker:latest .
scripts.docker:build:armv7: docker build --platform linux/arm/v7 -t graphator-web:armv7 . && docker build --platform linux/arm/v7 -f Dockerfile.worker -t graphator-worker:armv7 .
scripts.docker:build:multi: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -t elegy00/graphator-web:latest --load . && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -f Dockerfile.worker -t elegy00/graphator-worker:latest --load .
scripts.docker:build:multi:push: docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -t elegy00/graphator-web:latest --push . && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 -f Dockerfile.worker -t elegy00/graphator-worker:latest --push .
